document_data.name: House of Al-Dinak
document_data.mainbody: The '''House of Al-Dinak''' was one of the richest merchant families in [[Huzuz]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Organization: After experiencing a slew of devastating caravan attacks, the House of Al-Dinak began hiring adventurers to guard their caravans.
document_data.Base of Operations: The House of Al-Dinak was based out of the [[Warehouse District of Huzuz]].
document_data.History:
The House of Al-Dinak was a sworn enemy of the [[House of Al-Danafi]]. They recently closed one of their warehouses, prompting an insultingly low offer from Al-Danafi to purchase the holding.

Al-Dinak dealt with a variety of trade goods. The combination of poor decision-making and bad luck on the caravan trails left them dealing with hard times. Their financial situation lead others to believe that their goods possessed poor quality.
